SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 2
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: EIKE HARTMANN AND LEILA-MARIA HARTMANN-STEIN ARE FATHER AND DAUGHTER; SUSAN DILLBECK AND EMILY LEVIN ARE SISTERS; AALOK AND RAM SHRIVASTAVA ARE COUSINS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 6
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: SOLE MEMBER IS MAHARISHI GLOBAL COUNTRY OF WORLD PEACE STICHTING, INCORPORATED UNDER THE LAWS OF THE NETHERLANDS. OFFICE IS AT STATION 24, 6063 NP VLODROP, NETHERLANDS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: SOLE MEMBER HAS THE RIGHT TO ELECT MEMBERS OF THE BOARD.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION'S GOVERNING BOARD MUST OBTAIN THE APPROVAL OF THE SOLE MEMBER FOR CERTAIN GOVERNANCE DECISIONS, INCLUDING ELECTING, APPOINTING, OR REMOVING BOARD MEMBERS, APPROVING THE SALE, LEASE OR EXCHANGE OF ALL OR SUBSTANTIALLY ALL OF THE ORGANIZATION'S ASSETS, AND APPROVING THE DISSOLUTION OF THE ORGANIZATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FINANCE OFFICE IS RESPONSIBLE FOR OVERSEEING THE PREPARATION OF FORM 990. ONCE THE DRAFT IS COMPLETED IT IS PRESENTED TO THE CFO FOR REVIEW AND RECOMMENDATIONS. THE CFO ADVISES THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE THAT THE DRAFT 990 IS READY FOR REVIEW AND THEY PROVIDE THE FINAL APPROVAL FOR SUBMISSION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: DIRECTORS AND OFFICERS ARE ASKED TO SUBMIT A DECLARATION THAT THEY HAVE RECEIVED THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND THAT THEY COMPLY WITH IT.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION'S EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE USES COMPARABILITY DATA AS PART OF ITS PROCESS FOR DETERMINING AND SETTING COMPENSATION OF ITS DIRECTORS, OFFICERS, AND KEY EMPLOYEES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES AVAILABLE ON REQUEST THE ANNUAL IRS FORM 990 (MINUS SCHEDULE B), CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND GOVERNING DOCUMENTS.
